member.name: T:DepotDownloader.CDNClientPool
member.summary: CDNClientPool provides a pool of CDNClients to CDN endpoints CDNClients that get re-used will be initialized for the correct depots

member.summary: 1 - type (log, warning, error, exception) 2 - message (exception - Exception object, in other string)
